wpPost.title: FLS Leadership Development Program

seo.title: FLS Leadership Development Program - FLS
seo.metaDesc: The FLS Leadership Development Program is to help junior and mid-level managers accelerate their development and competence.
seo.opengraphDescription: The FLS Leadership Development Program is to help junior and mid-level managers accelerate their development and competence.

blocks.name: core/paragraph
blocks.saveContent: A skilled workforce is strategic to our sustainable and balanced growth which is why we are committed to nurturing talent. Guided by our core values, we curated and developed the FLS Leadership Development Program to help junior and mid-level managers accelerate personal development, build capability and become an active bridge between senior management and staff.

blocks.name: core/paragraph
blocks.saveContent: Our first program was successfully held from November to December 2022, preparing a team of top talent for our business plan in 2023 and the years to come.

blocks.name: core/paragraph
blocks.saveContent: Click through to meet our future leaders.
